siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Welcome to season 2 with a twist of Lemon. Stan starts off with a new season resolution to find Jon a new router. Will this be the year that burger reviews take the place of milkshake reviews? Stan has been having an existential crisis of whether we continue theâ€¦
